author: serge
msg: Changed every instance of constructing a Vector for the recipient list to instead construct a HashSet (in preparation for getting API recipients ready for Set).

author: serge
msg: Fixed my typo, and changed new instance calls to create HashSets (Sets) instead of Vectors.

author: serge
msg: Added getSize() method to MailImpl so POP3 can get the proper size of a message (MimeMessage does not include header size).  Submitted by Stuart Roebuck (renamed from getFullMessageSize to getSize size it's functioning on a different object).
